SpecificationCreation.nlg
Class SpecModifier

java.lang.Object
  SpecificationCreation.nlg.SpecModifier

public class SpecModifier
extends Object

SpecModifier handles the process of fine-tuning a new lexicon entry.

Version:
1.1 04-04-2007
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

Constructor Detail

SpecModifier

public SpecModifier(DependencyTreeTransformer dt,
                    String domain,
                    String range,
                    boolean objectProp)
Constructor, takes a template DependencyTree and enables user to fine-tune it

Parameters:
dt - DependencyTreeTransformer
domain - class-name of domain
range - class-name of range
objectProp - True if this is a specification for an object property
Method Detail

setInverse

public void setInverse(boolean in)
Set whether this is a specification for an inverse property

Parameters:
in - True if this is spec for inverse property

undo

public boolean undo()
Undoes the last operation performed.

Returns:
true if more operations can be undone, false if this was the last and undo button should be disabled

makeNP

public static DTNode makeNP(String label,
                            int detType,
                            boolean objectProp)
Makes a noun phrase representing 'a [label]' (e.g. a person), of if this is a date property, a prepositional phrase representing 'on a date'.

Parameters:
label - Noun (class name)
detType - Type of determiner, see SGNode for details
objectProp - True if this is a specification for an object property
Returns:
DTNode with noun phrase
See Also:
SGNode.getDeterminer(int,OntologyReader)

getSurfaceForm

public List<AnchorString> getSurfaceForm(int type,
                                         boolean anchors)
                                  throws SurfaceRealisationException
Returns a surface form of the given deptree of the given type.

Parameters:
type - Type of surface form (normal, aggregated, relative clause, query)
anchors - True to include anchors, false to leave them out
Returns:
List with surface form
Throws:
SurfaceRealisationException
See Also:
NORMAL, AGGREGATE, RELATIVE_CLAUSE, QUERY

getSurfaceForms

public List<FeedbackText> getSurfaceForms()
                                   throws SurfaceRealisationException
Returns the specification surface form to be manipulated, plus the other surface forms that may be generated from it (e.g. aggregated, relative clause).

Returns:
ListThrows:
SurfaceRealisationException

addAnchors

public void addAnchors(DependencyTreeTransformer copy)
Adds anchors to the given tree, which provide options to refine the specification

Parameters:
copy - DependencyTreeTransformer

update

public void update(String action,
                   String id,
                   String value)
Updates the tree with the option the user has selected

Parameters:
action - Option selected by user
id - Unique ID of anchor
value - Value supplied by user, e.g. root of newly added word. Null for actions that do not require a value

getDT

public DependencyTreeTransformer getDT()
Returns the specification

Returns:
DependencyTreeTransformer
